alert.note: Alert for Benton; Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 15 at 11:29PM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Benton, western Washington and southeastern Adair Counties through MIDNIGHT CST... At 1129 PM CST, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 2 miles west of Westville to 7 miles south of Stilwell. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Fayetteville... Farmington... Prairie Grove... Tontitown... West Fork... Lincoln... Cave Springs... Greenland... Highfill... Cincinnati... Blackburn... Strickler... Elm Springs... Walnut Grove... Savoy... Wedington... Rhea... Canehill... Odell... Rocky Comfort... This includes Interstate 49 near mile marker 45, and between mile markers 51 and 53. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CST for northwestern Arkansas...and northeastern Oklahoma.
